评论详情: I recently tried the olive boho ruffle sleeve V-neck midi dress, and while it has some great qualities, it wasn't the right fit for me. I ordered a size large (I'm 5'8" and 175 lbs) and found the dress too baggy at the front for my liking. While it's meant to feel flowy, I personally prefer something a bit more form-fitting—but not tight—and this dress just felt oversized, especially in the front area.  On the plus side, the fabric is incredibly soft and felt great on my skin. The V-neck is flattering, and the dress has pockets, which is always a huge bonus! I could see this being an excellent choice for a maternity dress, as it offers plenty of space and comfort.  Although I didn't keep it due to the loose fit, I still think it's a nice dress overall, just not quite my style.

Flattering and comfortable.  Doesn’t look like a nightgown but has the same comfortable fit. I feel like I’m cheating when I wear this to work, haha.
